org.diachron.detection.repositories

Class JenaVirtuosoRep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diachron.detection.repositories.JenaVirtuosoRep

  • public class JenaVirtuosoRep
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a set of methods which are used to handle Virtuoso Triple Store using Jena API calls.

        Creates a new Virtuoso connection using a Jena RepositoryConnection.
        Parameters:
        virt_instance - The IP of the machine which hosts Virtuoso.
        usr - The username of the certified user.
        pwd - The password of the certified user.
